item.title: Favorite Johor Food Places
item.author: hong@mrleong.net (Hong)
item.description: This is a listing of my favorite food places in Klang Valley. China Cuisine Restoran Fu Cheng 福成 Address: 6, Jalan 1/77b, Jalan Changkat Thambi Dollah, 55100 Kuala Lumpur Pork Noodle Omega Pork Noodle @ Sri Petaling Address: No 74, Ground Floor, Jalan Radin Tengah, Bandar Baru Sri Petaling, 57000 Kuala Lumpur Siew Kee Pork Noodle 兆基猪肉粉 Address: 16-34, Jalan Medan Putra 3, Medan Putra Bussiness Centre, 52200 Kuala Lumpur

item.title: Favorite Johor Food Places
item.author: hong@mrleong.net (Hong)
item.description: This is a listing of my favorite food places in Johor. Beef Noodle 大丰牛肉面 Address: 12, Jalan Kasa 6, Taman Sentosa, 80150 Johor Bahru, Johor Burger Woodfire Address: Eco Spring, SL006, Spring Labs, Lot D, Jalan Ekoflora Utama, 81100 Johor Bahru, Johor Chicken Chop Gebekk western Food Address: Unit SL-007, Spring Lab, Lok K, Jalan Ekoflora Utama, Taman Ekoflora, 81100 Johor Bahru, Johor Restoran Hua Mui 华美 Address: 131, Jalan Trus, Bandar Johor Bahru, 80000 Johor Bahru, Johor
